message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got a better offer, now it's your turn to make a better one!
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not desperate yet, I'll give you a bit more!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll make one last stand!
You're almost out of time, this is my last offer!
I'll give you one more chance, but this is my final offer!
You're out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not accepting anything less than a fair share, I'll take nothing!
